about_the_game:
Explore the mysterious Chernokamensk Anomaly Zone with your faithful four-legged friend in this single-player extraction shooter featuring procedurally generated locations, brought to you by the creator of Paradox of Hope.

GAMEPLAY

  • Prepare yourself. Choose and maintain your firearms, stock up on ammo and supplies - plan your raid wisely or die a foolish death.
  • Scavenge and Survive. Collect valuable loot, survive and exfil. Be careful: in case of death, all uninsured equipment will be lost.
  • Extract and Repeat. Sell your found valuables and artifacts, and use the proceeds to buy yourself a new piece of equipment, a cooler gun or a more spacious backpack.

MAIN FEATURES

  • Companion Dog: A loyal partner that aids not only in battle but also in scavenging for supplies.
  • Extensive Arsenal of Realistic Weapons: Customize your weapons extensively for a personalized experience.
  • Procedurally Generated Locations: Each expedition offers a unique experience.
  • Ultimate immersion: No floating windows or laser pointers; all interfaces are diegetic.
  • Leaderboards: Compete against other players and win unique rewards.
  • Enhanced Accessibility Options: Customize your experience with seated mode, left-handed mode, and multiple movement and turning styles.

STORY

At the turn of the 20th and 21st centuries, an explosion rocked a clandestine laboratory in Chernokamensk. A massive energy release transformed the city into an exclusion zone, periodically illuminated by an eerie glow. The government sealed off the region from the outside world with an imposing wall.

The true nature of the zone and its real happenings remain shrouded in mystery. The leak of secret documents, in which one word - 'convergence' was often repeated, did not clarify the situation either.

However, whispers of untold treasures and enigmatic artifacts traverse the land, attracting people from all corners of the country to Chernokamensk. Some delve into the anomalous territory as part of special volunteer units, while others trespass illegally.

You will assume the role of an artifact hunter, a member of a specialized squad granted access to the restricted area. The zone is in constant flux, and to unveil its secrets, you must confront bandits, wild animals, and enigmatic demons that emerge to hunt under the veil of night.

name: CONVRGENCE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700k / AMD Ryzen 7-5700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070 / RX 6700 XT
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: CONVRGENCE is an immersive single-player VR shooter with survival and horror elements. Explore the Chernokamensk Anomaly Zone: scavenge for loot, fight bandits and hunt for mystical artifacts. However be sure to return to base before duskfall, for when night arrives the hunter becomes the hunted.
